Spring Onion and Ginger Salad
250g spring onions, shredded (greens and whites)
50g ginger, finely minced
60ml neutral oil
1½ tsp light soy sauce
¾ tsp sherry vinegar
¾ tsp kosher salt
  1. Mix everything together, check for salt
  2. Tastes better after sitting for a while
